channel.title: [BUG] Butler Showed as Special/Investigative to Princess
channel.description:
#### What happened? As Princess, N1, flirted with #3, who was the Butler, who showed up as Special/Invesitgative. I was then immediately converted to Unseen. I passed my info the next night to Psychic, and #3 was killed, revealing him to be the Butler. When the Psychic died his log revealed that I had said #3 was Special/Invesitgative, and since Butler is not one of those, I was executed.
#### Comments:![20180126221441_1|690x376](upload://eXB2t6KtrddE5vl3tNDbYwgVTpt.jpg)

So will Mindwarp, but I see a dead Psychic.

item.title: [BUG] Butler Showed as Special/Investigative to Princess
item.dc:creator: jfulltime
item.description:
What happened?

As Princess, N1, flirted with #3, who was the Butler, who showed up as Special/Invesitgative. I was then immediately converted to Unseen. I passed my info the next night to Psychic, and #3 was killed, revealing him to be the Butler. When the Psychic died his log revealed that I had said #3 was Special/Invesitgative, and since Butler is not one of those, I was executed.
